title: NATURE THREAT: RUSKELL SAYS EMISSIONS ARE KEY ISSUE TO TACKLE (Scottish Green Party)
text: ( Source : Scottish Green Party ) Tuesday, October 13th , 2015 Mark Ruskell , Rural Affairs and Environment spokesperson for the Scottish Greens , says the Responses for Nature report highlighting threats to the environment and wildlife
